Name: Slappyball
About the game: Become the volleyball player of your dreams: Except you are a walking human hand, also you are playing Slappyball instead. BUMP, SET, SPIKE, AND SLAP Step up to the court and show who has the better ball handling skills in 3v3s, 2v2s, 1v1s, Casual and Ranked mode. Bump, set, spike and slap your way to the top of the leaderboards. Check back in with your agent to negotiate bigger payouts. IT'S CALLED FASHION, SWEETIE Don't get rusty at the true end-game: Fashion . Unlock new outfits through the Slappypass and see what the daily store has to offer. Style on your opponents through skill and a superior fashion sense. Get Slappyball Premium to get a star next to your name, marking you as the true MVP. Slappyball is an Early Access game shaped by its players. Join our Discord and let us know what your vision is.
Meta Title: Slappyball: May 21, 2021, Amelore and Full Overview
